power.title: Aimed Shot
power.fluff: Your mastery of ranged weapons allows you to strike past cover or concealment

section.text: You ignore the penalty for concealment and cover, and the penalty for superior cover and total concealment is reduced to -2

power.title: Beast Strike
power.fluff: You guide your companion to attack, taking full advantage of its abilities

section.name: Bear:
section.text: The beast can make the attack against Fortitude instead

section.name: Serpent:
section.text: The beast can make the attack against Reflex instead

section.name: Spider:
section.text: If the target is immobilized or slowed, the beast deals additional damage. The additional damage equals your Wisdom modifier if the target is immobilized, or half that if it is slowed.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The damage equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier, or half the total.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The damage equals 4 + your Wisdom modifier, or half the total.

section.name: Wolf:
section.text: If the beast has combat advantage for the attack, it can knock the target prone.

section.name: Special (Cat):
section.text: The beast can make this attack in place of a melee basic attack when charging, and gains a bonus to the damage roll when doing so. The bonus to damage equals your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: The bonus to damage equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: The bonus to damage equals 4 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Special (Boar):
section.text: The beast can make this attack in place of a melee basic attack when charging, and gains a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered as part of the charge.

power.title: Careful Attack
power.fluff: You study the enemy, looking for a gap in its defenses for you to strike

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you have combat advantage, you deal half of the minimum damage.

power.title: Circling Strike
power.fluff: Using the distraction your attack provides, your beat companion finds a better positin

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before the attack, your beast companion can shift up to 1 square, or up to 2 squares if it ends the shift adjacent to the target.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Shift up to 2 squares, or up to 3 squares if it ends the shift adjacent to the target.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If your beast companion did not shift before the attack, it shift up to 1 square, or up to 2 squares if it does not end the shift adjacent to the target.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Up to 2 squares, or up to 3 squares if it does not end the shift adjacent to the target.

power.title: Combined Assault
power.fluff: You and your beast companion attack at the same time

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the Primary Attack and the Beast Attack in either order.

power.title: Fading Strike
power.fluff: You launch an attack against your foe and then back away for safety

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 2 squares to a space that is not adjacent to the target.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when you make a reactive strike.

power.title: Hit and Run
power.fluff: You make your attack, then run past your foe to a better position

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +4 bonus to all defenses against attack triggered by your movement until the start of your next turn.
If you move during the current turn, leaving the first square adjacent to the target does not trigger reactive strikes.

section.name: Special:
section.text: When you learn this power, you can choose add the Beast keyword to it. You can retrain this choice just like retraining the power.
If you add the Beast keyword, the power's effect applies to your beast companion instead of you.

power.title: Hunter's Teamwork
power.fluff: You use a nearby ally to gain advantage with your attack

section.text: If two or more allies are adjacent to the target, you gain combat advantage for this attack

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If at least two allies are flanking the target, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Marauder's Rush
power.fluff: You rush forward, trusting instinct to guide your attack

section.text: If you were not adjacent to the target at the start of your turn, you deal additional damage equal to 1 + one-half your Strength modifier (minimum +2).

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack when you charge.

power.title: Nimble Strike
power.fluff: You slink past an enemy's guard to take your shot, or withdraw after one

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can shift up to 2 squares.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you did not shift the full distance before the attack, you can shift the remaining distance.

power.title: Predator Strike
power.fluff: Your enemy focuses its attention on you, allowing your beast to attack

section.text: If you flank the target with your beast, it deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Shield of Blades
power.fluff: You defend with one weapon while striking with the other

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +2 bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Defensive weapon:
section.text: If at least one weapon you wield has the Defensive trait, you also gain a +2 power bonus to Reflex.
You lose this bonus if you stop wielding two melee weapons.

power.title: Throw and Stab
power.fluff: You fling your weapon at one foe, and then rush another enemy

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a thrown weapon and another melee weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed and make a melee basic attack with the melee weapon against a creature other than the primary target.

power.title: Twin Strike
power.fluff: If the first attack doesn't kill it, the second one might

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons or a ranged weapon

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (main weapon or ranged weapon)

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (off-hand weapon or ranged weapon)

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose 1 square either in or adjacent to the primary target's space. You can use the Reaction Shot attack until the start of your next turn.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A creature enters the chosen square
